description:
Alfredo is a 23 year-old Italian (Sicilian) who is an investment banker during the day and a martial arts instructor in the evenings.
And as you can see, he loves to stay in great shape. He's got an incredible body and enjoys showing it off every chance he gets. In his spare time, he likes to do almost anything outdoors, but especially likes soccer.
Watch Alfredo as he shows off his beautiful body and works out his favorite muscle.
title: Alfredo
